with temp as ( select a.ProductNo, a.OnSalesTime as DateShelf, a.ProductModel as GoodsNo, a.ProductModel , a.ProductName, b.ProductShowPic as ProductPicFile, b.ProductShowPic , b.IsOutSide, c.PcSaleState as IsShelf, c.PcSaleState , c.PcShowState, d.BrandCnName, d.BrandEnName, e.status as IsPublish, f.TemplateName, row_number() over(order by a.CreateTime desc) as row from SpProduct (nolock) as a left join SpfProductExtend (nolock) as b on a.ProductNo=b.ProductNo left join SpfSkuExtend (nolock) as c on a.ProductNo=c.ProductNo left join SpBrand (nolock) as d on a.BrandNo = d.BrandNo left join SWfsProductRef (nolock) as e on a.productNO=e.ProductNO left join SWfsProductTemplate (nolock) as f on f.TemplateNO=e.TemplateNO
where 1=1 #if($Keyword!='') and (a.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or a.ProductNo =@KeyWord or a.ProductModel =@KeyWord) #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and a.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($Gender !='') and a.ProductSex=@Gender #end #if($BrandNO !='') and a.BrandNo=@BrandNO #end #if($IsShelf!='') and c.PcSaleState=@IsShelf #end #if($IsPublish!='') and e.Status=@IsPublish #end #if($TemplateName!='') and f.TemplateName like '%'+@TemplateName+'%' #end #if($StartDateShelf!='') and c.PcShelfDate > @StartDateShelf #end #if($EndDateShelf!='') and c.PcShelfDate < @EndDateShelf #end #if($IsOutSide!='') and b.IsOutSide =@IsOutSide #end ) select * from temp where row between (@pageIndex-1)*@pageSize+1 and @pageIndex*@pageSize

select count(0) from SpProduct (nolock) as a left join SpfProductExtend (nolock) as b on a.ProductNo=b.ProductNo left join SpfSkuExtend (nolock) as c on a.ProductNo=c.ProductNo left join SpBrand (nolock) as d on a.BrandNo = d.BrandNo left join SWfsProductRef (nolock) as e on a.productNO=e.ProductNO left join SWfsProductTemplate (nolock) as f on f.TemplateNO=e.TemplateNO
where 1=1 #if($Keyword!='') and (a.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or a.ProductNo =@KeyWord or a.ProductModel =@KeyWord) #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and a.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($Gender !='') and a.ProductSex=@Gender #end #if($BrandNO !='') and a.BrandNo=@BrandNO #end #if($IsShelf!='') and c.PcSaleState=@IsShelf #end #if($IsPublish!='') and c.Status=@IsPublish #end #if($TemplateName!='') and d.TemplateName like '%'+@TemplateName+'%' #end #if($StartDateShelf!='') and c.PcShelfDate > @StartDateShelf #end #if($EndDateShelf!='') and c.PcShelfDate < @EndDateShelf #end #if($IsOutSide!='') and b.IsOutSide =@IsOutSide #end

select a.ProductNo,a.RefLabelNo,a.Weight,RefLabelParentNo,b.LabelName,c.LabelType,c.LabelName ParentLabelName from SwfsProductRefLabel a left join SWfsProductLabel b on a.RefLabelNo=b.LabelNo left join SWfsProductLabel c on a.RefLabelParentNo=c.LabelNo where ProductNo=@ProductNo
SELECT count(0) FROM [SWfsProductLabel](nolock) WHERE ParentNo=@ParentNo AND LabelName=@LabelName
SELECT count(0) FROM [SWfsProductLabel](nolock) WHERE ParentNo=@ParentNo AND LabelId!=@LabelId AND LabelName=@LabelName
select COUNT(0) from SWfsProductLabel where ParentNo=@ParentNo
select b.PictureFileNo from SpfSkuExtend as a inner join SpfSkuPicture as b on a.SkuNo=b.SkuNo and 3 > b.PictureType where a.ProductNo=@ProductNo
select top $getCount * from SWfsProductLabelSearchHistory(nolock) where SearchUser=@SearchUser order by CreateDate desc
